node.title: Unshackle the crackle: Dry-aged pork makes Australian debut on supermarket shelves
node.description: The Australian product has made its debut in local stores â€” and the overwhelming reaction has been one of lip-smacking delight.
node.content:
["Sick of cooking the same old meals for your family? Dry aged pork could be your new favourite source of protein.", "Dry-ageing pork has been a method used almost exclusively in high-end restaurants and butcheries, but now the Australian product has hit supermarket shelves for the first time.", "Ben Williamson, co-owner and chef at Agnes in Brisbane, says\u00a0dry-aged pork is \"superior\"\u00a0to\u00a0regular pork products in supermarkets.", "\"That dry-ageing process, just like beef;\u00a0it just adds so much flavour and texture to the product.\"", "\"You lose some moisture in the process but the more moisture you lose, the more intense the flavour becomes.\"", "\"It's not overly porky though;\u00a0it's a slightly nuttier [taste].\"", "Dry-aged pork retails in the supermarket from $10 a kilo, similar to other pork products.", "", "
Ben Williamson said dry-aged pork\u00a0creates mouth-watering crackle.(Unsplash)
", "Most pork is placed into\u00a0plastic and vacuum-packed\u00a0soon after butchering, a process known as \"wet-ageing\",\u00a0but dry-ageing requires some days or weeks in a clean, refrigerated environment with no other kinds of food present.\u00a0", "
Supporting Australian farmers
", "Mr Williamson said the protein can be cooked the same ways as any other cut of regular pork.", "\"But my favourite recipe is a simple roast,\" he said.", "", "
Mr Williamson says dry-aged pork has\u00a0a rich flavour.(Supplied:\u00a0Agnes)
", "\"Season it really well, roast it and serve it up with your favourite vegetables.\"", "Chief executive of Australian Pork, Margo Andrae, said the product's release into supermarkets was timely, as people had been experimenting in the kitchen more over the past few years.\u00a0", "\"Consumers want to try new things, but they also want to support Australian agriculture,\" she said.", "\"At this stage, it's only Borrowdale Free Range Pork farm in Queensland [dry-ageing pork in Australia], but we're expecting more producers to come online, given its success ... at this stage it's still niche.\"", "\"We hope to see further uptake by more supermarkets of dry-aged pork in the future, as consumers become more confident cooking new products at home.\"", "", "
Dry-aged pork is available in Woolworths from $10 a kilogram.(Supplied: Australian Pork limited)
", "Dry-aged pork loin steak and dry-aged pork scotch steak products are sold in select\u00a0Woolworths stores across New South Wales, Victoria and South Australia."]
